Summary a ge_stats object

Source: R/summary.ge_stats.R
summary.ge_stats.Rd

Summary the ge_stats object in two ways. By default, the results are shown in the R console. The results can also be exported to the directory into a *.txt file.

# S3 method for ge_stats
summary(object, export = FALSE, file.name = NULL,
  digits = 3, ...)

Arguments

object

The ge_stats object
export

A logical argument. If TRUE, a *.txt file is exported to the working directory.
file.name

The name of the file if export = TRUE
digits

The significant digits to be shown.
...

Other arguments of the function

Examples


library(METAAB)
model = ge_stats(.data = data_ge2,
                 env = ENV,
                 gen = GEN,
                 rep = REP,
                 resp = PH)
summary(model)
